title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 650.7 - Certification and renewal procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 650.7 - Certification and renewal procedures

State Regulations
(a) Any person seeking certification shall
submit an application on a form specified by the department. The department
shall issue a certificate which specifies the operator grade consistent with
the operator qualifications specified in this Part. (b) Certificates shall be valid for a period
of five years unless revoked by the department prior to that time. (c) Certificates may be renewed upon
application 90 days prior to the date of expiration on a form specified by the
department. An operator whose certificate has expired may have his/her
certificate reinstated upon meeting the renewal requirements and may be
required to pass an exam. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
650.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
